contents.text: Welcome to iCrossing, the San Francisco marketing agency for the modern world.
For information about our digital marketing and strategy services, press 1.
To discuss our SEO and content marketing solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an SEO and content marketing specialist.

navigationGoals: Get a quick SEO and content marketing action plan to improve our website’s search rankings.
Improve my veteran-owned small business's search visibility to attract more local clients.
Request a technical SEO audit with content-gap analysis and backlink performance metrics
I’m calling to get help improving my website’s SEO and content marketing.
I’d like to discuss SEO and content marketing strategies for my physics outreach blog.

contents.text: To learn about our social media and paid advertising services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a social media and paid advertising expert.

navigationGoals: Outline a targeted social media and paid ads strategy for our upcoming product launch.
Set up targeted social media ad campaigns to raise awareness for my veteran advocacy nonprofit.
Set up a multi-channel paid advertising campaign with UTM tracking and ROI projections
I need to speak with someone about setting up and managing my social media and paid ads.
I want to learn about social media and paid advertising options to promote my student research group.

contents.text: For client support and account management, press 2.
To reach your account manager directly, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to your dedicated account manager.

navigationGoals: Connect me to my account manager for a status update on our ongoing campaigns.
Review the status of my current marketing project with my dedicated account manager.
Connect with my dedicated account manager to review API integrations and campaign performance KPIs
I want to talk directly with my account manager about my ongoing projects.
I need to speak with my dedicated account manager about the status of my current marketing campaign.

contents.text: For billing and invoice inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify the charges and due date on my latest invoice with billing.
Clarify a charge on my latest retainer invoice for ongoing services.
Obtain an itemized billing report with line-item ad spend breakdown and reconcile invoice overage charges
I have a question about a recent invoice and need help with billing.
I have a question about a recent invoice and need help with billing details.
